game.name: PAYDAY 2: Gage Russian Weapon Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A delivery from RussiaGage just a got a delivery from a foreign contact - a container full of russian weapons. These guns won’t break due to a speck of dust or some drops of water. They‘ll withstand a nuclear blast and will never jam. They are built to get the job done.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A delivery from RussiaGage just a got a delivery from a foreign contact - a container full of russian weapons. These guns won’t break due to a speck of dust or some drops of water. They‘ll withstand a nuclear blast and will never jam. They are built to get the job done.
